title: Bug 114470: Error message throws when using new Date("3/2/2005") as value in table filter.
description: When using the value new Date("3/2/2005") in a table filter, an error message is thrown.
OB: When using the value new Date("3/2/2005") as the filter value in a table, an error message is displayed on the report page.
EB: Filter works without errors when using the value new Date("3/2/2005") in a table filter.
SR:
1. Open the table filter menu.
2. Set the filter value as new Date("3/2/2005").
3. Save and preview the report.
4. Verify that the filter works without any errors on the report page.
